eventName: The Great Detective's Case Files - Volume I
storyName: The Great Detective's Case Files - Volume I
storyInfo: May struggles with a lack of clues in her first case. With Heidi's help, she finds the clues and catches the killer.

attributes.content: Mrs Bride's time of death was late yesterday evening, after the maid had locked the door.
The manor is heavily guarded, surrounded by the lake on three sides, with high walls between the water and the manor.
It is simply impossible for an outsider to break in unnoticed.
Therefore...
The killer is right here, among us!
R-Really, Miss Metis?
attributes.name: Plump Merchant

attributes.content: There's a killer among us? That can't be!
attributes.name: Noblewoman

attributes.content: Poppycock! Ridiculous!
attributes.name: Wealthy Man

attributes.content: I take it that you've found the evidence to implicate the killer?
attributes.name: Calm Woman

attributes.content: Huh? Er, well...
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Ahem, o-of course I have!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: First, according to the maid's testimony, an Originium ornament that was supposed to be in the bedroom went missing after the incident.
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: The victim's injuries indicate that this was likely the weapon!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: You don't mean to say whoever is carrying the weapon is the killer, do you?
attributes.name: Wealthy Man

attributes.content: I doubt anyone would carry something like that on their person.
attributes.name: Noblewoman

attributes.content: Quiet while I'm deducing!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Of course, that's not the only thing! Here's the second point: The scene of the crime is very messy, with a large amount of blood on the victim's face and hands.
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Madam Bride suffered a large number of wounds on her body, in addition to the fatal wound on her head. Do you understand what this means, Miss Heidi?
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: It means... there was a struggle between the killer and the victim?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Exactly! A bloody one too!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: At that distance, it was inevitable that the killer would have gotten blood on them!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Therefore, whoever has got blood on them must be the killer!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: How's that!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: What a load of rubbish! No one here's got any blood on them!
attributes.name: Wealthy Man

attributes.content: Huh? B-But...
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: How could that be? It's impossible... one of us must be the killer!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Just how stupid are you?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: W-Why are you stooping to insults? What have I done to you?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: It's not an insult, it's the truth.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: I wasn't expecting much out of your first case, but that deduction's got more holes than a sieve.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: I'm afraid... so.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: See, Anna's with me.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Et tu, Istina?!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: After what I've just heard, it is inevitable.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: The logic is sound, in a vacuum, but there's no way that a killer would appear wearing blood-soaked clothes. They would try to destroy any evidence.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Anyone with a brain would.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: I guess... that makes sense.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: The killer wasn't dumb enough to walk around covered in blood, and the witnesses were sure they didn't see anyone bloodied in the manor.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: I had taken this into account, of course. Therefore—
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: You checked all our belongings. There were no bloody clothes!
attributes.name: Wealthy Man

attributes.content: Enough of this farce, Miss Metis Geraldine!
attributes.name: Wealthy Man

attributes.content: T-That can't be! I must have missed it...
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: The results are here for all of us to see, Miss Metis.
attributes.name: Plump Merchant

attributes.content: Not a one of us is holding anything suspicious.
attributes.name: Noblewoman

attributes.content: Isn't it time to hand this case over to the police? We really must be going.
attributes.name: Noblewoman

attributes.content: Yes, too much time has been wasted here already.
attributes.name: Plump Merchant

attributes.content: Wait! Just give me a little bit longer!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: I'll find the clues and catch the killer! I swear it!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Please, just a little more time...
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Noblewoman

attributes.content: Well... what do you think, Miss Heidi?
attributes.name: Plump Merchant

attributes.content: I would beg your patience for just a little longer.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Miss Heidi! Thank you so much...
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Do you really believe the killer is among us, Miss Heidi?
attributes.name: Plump Merchant

attributes.content: I have every faith in your character, and that of everyone else present. Which is why we should allow our detective here to prove our collective innocence.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: What would people outside say if we left now and the police were unable to solve the case?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: The rumor mill may not be so rational.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: I suppose you're right.
attributes.name: Noblewoman

attributes.content: Very well, if you say so.
attributes.name: Wealthy Man

attributes.content: And I want to see what this self-proclaimed detective can do!
attributes.name: Wealthy Man

attributes.content: W-Who are you calling self-proclaimed?!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: I mean, sure, it's the first time I've faced a case like this... but I'll solve it!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: That piece of Gloompincer dung...
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Don't let it get to you, Miss Metis, we all believe in you.
attributes.name: Plump Merchant

attributes.content: Thank you, Mr. Hull!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Mr Hull, you have a mismatched jacket and necktie.
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: I-Is that so? How embarrassing. The maid must have brought me the wrong jacket.
attributes.name: Plump Merchant

attributes.content: Anyway, I won't take up any more of your time. I look forward to good news.
attributes.name: Plump Merchant

attributes.content: Alright, snap out of it.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Sir William might have been a little brusque, but he was reasonably cooperative.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Do you suspect him to be the killer?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Not really...
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: I've identified a more likely suspect.
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Setting that aside for a moment... any updates on what I asked, Miss Heidi?
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: I didn't find anything in the rooms. No clues regarding the killer at all. You, the client, are the only one I can trust!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: You have the honor of being my first assistant ever!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: It's an honor. I suppose.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: But did you consider the possibility that the client could be the killer?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: What? O-Of course, I've considered it!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: I haven't let my guard down, just because you had an alibi!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: It's a trick that detectives use to get suspects to let their guard down... yes, that's it!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Hehe. Well then, I'd better work harder to clear my name.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Would you like to hear my report?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Yes, straight away!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: What did you find? Did anyone sneak into the kitchen or use the fireplace? Or perhaps somewhere else a fire could be lit?
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: As far as I can tell, no.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: The kitchens were being watched by the servants and they didn't see anyone. No sign of fires being lit in the fireplaces in the rooms. Nothing was destroyed by fire.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: So, no clues at all?
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: How could this be...?
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: The killer would not keep such a clue with them. They would try to destroy it at the first opportunity. Fire would be the safest way to do so.
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Could it be... Originium Arts?
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: A skilled caster could destroy evidence by conjuring flames out of nothing. That would make it impossible to find a clue.
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Or not... it was an Originium ornament. Those things don't burn so easily. There must be some trace.
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: But we've searched the entire manor.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: And there was nothing.
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: How am I supposed to solve this case if I can't even find the murder weapon?
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: (Is this too much for me to crack?)
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Are you giving up?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: O-Of course I'm not giving up!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: I'm just...
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Do you think it's hopeless? That the evidence must have been destroyed?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: It's true that I wasn't able to find any clues...
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: (Miss Heidi must be disappointed.)
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: (Oh no, the tears are starting to flow... please stop!)
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: I-I'm sorry, Miss Heidi, I, I could find a more experienced detective if you're not satisfied with my performance.
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: But p-please just give me a little more time.
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: I, I'll get to the bottom of this... please don't fire me! *wails*
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: I never said I was firing you.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: You may be inexperienced, but I see potential in your determined search for clues.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: There must be a way, even if we might be missing some evidence.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: After all, the truth is always there. It never changes.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: The truth's always there...
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Any crime must leave a trail...
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Exactly!
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: A great detective won't let herself get frustrated so easily.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: B-But I'm just a no-name detective, and this is my first big case... I... I...
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: I don't know if I can do this on my own.
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Say, what happened to the confident young detective I hired?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Besides, you're not alone.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: What do you mean...?
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Didn't you say I was your first assistant?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Or are you taking it back so hastily?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Miss Heidiiiiiiiiiiiiiii!!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Yes! I'll become a household name, and everyone will know that you were my first assistant!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Ugh.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Don't be so harsh, Sonya. It's just a little bit much for the dinner table.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: That's basically what I meant, yeah.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: The fat guy did it. Why are we even talking about this?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: You're all the same!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: This was the second most touching scene of my first case! The detective and her assistant! The assistant comforting the detective in her darkest hour...
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Isn't it touching?!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Er... well, sure, I suppose so.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: The interaction between the detective and his assistant is certainly one of the selling points of many mystery novels. Classics of the genre set these two characters up to contrast with each other.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: See? Hehe...
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: (Not sure if a mystery novel would work with a detective like this, though.)
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Okay, let's forget this first assistant you never saw again. Didn't you call Skyfire your seventh assistant last time?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: She almost set you on fire for that. A couple words of encouragement, and you're falling head over heels.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Hmph! You don't understand the detective-assistant dynamic at all!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Yeah, whatever. Just get this over with.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: After that, it was the Metis Show, of course...
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: The scene of the crime looks the same.
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: (We've searched it many times. Another sweep won't yield any clues.)
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: (We should look somewhere else.)
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Hmm.
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: (Nothing here... don't suppose anyone would leave bloody evidence out in the open.)
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Ouch!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: My head...
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: (No, nothing here either.)
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: (I must have missed something... but where could it be?)
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: (Did they really destroy all the evidence?)
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: No, that can't be!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Any crime must leave a trail. They won't fool me!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: (This is the last area. If there's nothing here...)
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: (Could the killer really have committed a crime without leaving a trail?)
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: (What's that outside the window?)
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: (The lake outside the manor?)
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: (Wait, if it's visible from here, it must be visible from the scene of the crime!)
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: This must be the place!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: I knew it!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: This room is higher than the wall, and the window faces the lake!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: I've got it...
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Give me a second... whew. What happened, Miss Metis? Why did you...?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Miss Heidi!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Ah, I'm here?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: I found it! I found the clue!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: It wasn't fire, it was water!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: That's where the evidence must be... over there!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: The lake?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Do you mean that the killer threw the bloody clothes into the lake?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: And we didn't search outside the manor!
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Let me guess, you want to say that they couldn't have thrown their clothes such a distance, right?
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: But clothes aren't the only thing we're looking for!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: We're also looking for the murder weapon!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Why didn't anyone see the bloody clothes? Because the killer didn't leave the scene wearing them!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Why didn't we find the weapon? Because the killer wrapped the bloody clothes around it and threw it into the lake!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: This explains everything!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: But finding the killer won't be easy, if they indeed threw all the evidence into the lake.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Just because it's not easy doesn't mean it's impossible!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: I'll find the clues and the killer, no matter what it takes!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Why the face?! This is the climactic moment!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Where's the applause? Where's the praise?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: (Slow clap)
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: And then what happened?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Don't tell me that's the end.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: O-Of course not! After that, it was the Metis Show...
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: We heard that part already.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Enough nitpicking! Do you find some fault with my detective adventure?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Now then, the ending—
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: This is quite enough. When can we leave?
attributes.name: Noblewoman

attributes.content: This is absurd! I refuse to entertain this little girl's detective games any longer!
attributes.name: Wealthy Man

attributes.content: Miss Metis, I don't think we can proceed without any evidence.
attributes.name: Plump Merchant

attributes.content: Hehehe...
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Hehe, hehehe, hahahaha!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Wh-What are you laughing at?
attributes.name: Wealthy Man

attributes.content: I'm laughing at the foolish killer, who still thinks they can escape me, and justice.
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: A criminal always leaves a trail, and it's up to a detective to find it.
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: And I'm happy to say that I've found the evidence!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Really?!
attributes.name: Noblewoman

attributes.content: I present you the decisive evidence implicating the killer!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: T-This is the jacket Mr. Hull wore yesterday! Why is it all wet?
attributes.name: Noblewoman

attributes.content: Are those bloodstains?
attributes.name: Noblewoman

attributes.content: And the Originum ornament... is this the murder weapon?
attributes.name: Wealthy Man

attributes.content: That seems decisive. How do you explain this, Mr. Hull?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Th-This is all a big misunderstanding!
attributes.name: Plump Merchant

attributes.content: I, I just... er...
attributes.name: Plump Merchant

attributes.content: No more excuses!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: This is what you get for underestimating me! The evidence is clear! There's nowhere to run!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: My goodness, Miss Metis... how did you manage this?
attributes.name: Noblewoman

attributes.content: Hmph, looks like you're not all talk after all!
attributes.name: Wealthy Man

attributes.content: You're an outstanding detective!
attributes.name: Noblewoman and Wealthy Man

attributes.content: And I would have gotten away with it too, if it weren't for this meddling detective!
attributes.name: Plump Merchant

attributes.content: But you'll have to catch me first!
attributes.name: Plump Merchant

attributes.content: Not so fast!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Hah!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Ugh!
attributes.name: Plump Merchant

attributes.content: Hands up! No sudden moves!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: There's no such thing as an unsolvable mystery when I'm on the case!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Mr. Hull!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: You, sir, are the true culprit!
attributes.name: Metis

attributes.content: Hold it right there!
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: That's your ending?!
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: You're skipping right to the killer reveal? What kind of ending is that? And you just made up everyone else's lines, didn't you?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: W-What gave you that idea? They were all remarkably impressed with my detective work... it's only natural!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: That's quite enough, Zima! I won't stand for such an attack on a detective of renown!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Ha. If you're a 'detective of renown,' then I'm the new sheriff in town.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: The first half was okay, but your ending is even worse than 'The Death of Ilyich, the Suspect'...
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Hmph! Some people just can't appreciate a good story!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: But you're not one of them, are you, Istina?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Sonya may have been a little too harsh, but it's definitely missing some important details.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: For example, the killer wrapped the bloody clothes around the heavy Originium ornament, making sure that the evidence would sink to the bottom of the lake.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Yes, that's right!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: And it's not so easy to dredge up evidence from the bottom of a lake.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Well, er... it did take some time... I spent days digging through the mud, and we finally found the evidence with the help of the police...
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: So they didn't need you at all.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: It was I who found the clue! And I dug through the mud for three straight days! I found the evidence with my own hands!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: We got the killer in the end! What's a couple of days more or less?!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: That's not all.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: W-What else?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: The evidence happened to be preserved in the form of bloody clothing and a weapon this time. But what would you do if the culprit actually destroyed the evidence using Originium Arts?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Er... well, that happens from time to time...
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: The police have tools for investigating crimes by Arts users.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: So they didn't need you at all.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Oh, stuff it!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: At least the premise was interesting. Foolish detective and clever assistant.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Did you ever see Heidi again?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: What do you mean by 'at least?'
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Soon after, I encountered that suspicious penguin, so I went undercover to pursue him...
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Er, actually, never mind that.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: (Forget the undercover stuff...)
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: (You're still trying to hide it?)
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Ahem. Anyway, I never saw Miss Heidi again.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: But I'm sure my first assistant is still out there, and doing well.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: And we'll see each other again when I become a household name!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: But to do that...
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: I'll have to catch that fat penguin with the gold chain!
attributes.name: May
